markdownRemark.html:
With some added text it will be easier to see whether or not there will be able to be text-wrapping around the monkey image. I am also going to have to figure out how to display the image when there is a value in the frontmatter. If not, it shouldn't appear.

Nuclear submarine workers at Portsmouth, New Hampshire, are developing cancer at a rate that is double the expected incidence.
